title: comparing r*pe to clap : how will we ever move forward with this type of thinking?
selftext:
i know this video is old but the mentality and conditions are the same as it was 5 years ago. what was education system teaching that kids? and elders are at the most fault here because i have never read a book teaching all those things. consent is still a joke in large number of rural places in haryana. 

[https://youtu.be/Pgom8LRF8hQ?si=shvE6F8pgAQzj0Ro](https://youtu.be/Pgom8LRF8hQ?si=shvE6F8pgAQzj0Ro)
